channel.title: Albert Education 2023 on Yingkui
channel.description: Recent content in Albert Education 2023 on Yingkui

item.description: 重要概念 Skill is the atom and problem is the molecular. Problem has_many skill_rating_weights. Problem_container has_many problems and has_many skill_rating_weights. Player has a player_skill_rating for each skill. Player has a calculated score for each problem_container Problem_container has a rating based on related skills in skill_rating_weights. When update player_skill_rating, the problem_skill_rating as the opponent’s rating is calculated based on skill_rating_weight, time used, player_solving_history. problem_skill_rating = calculate_rectified_rating( skill_rating_weight.rating, skill_rating_weight.weight, time_used, player_solving_history ) Elo Rating Each Player (Student) has a Rating for each Skill.
记录 2023/12/25 设计网站细节
